I was ill for years with a chronic disease + managed to heal myself through an anti-inflammatory diet, restorative detox techniques, + reframing fear into optimism. Once I reached remission, I felt called to share my story - therefore Illest Optimist blog was born. My posts are all about tips + tricks to keep you in top physical, mental, + spiritual shape while at the same time allowing you to have a kickass life.

AS Branding works with healthy and socially conscious companies, marketing their brand and utilizing social media and content creation to increase awareness and sales. Branding We work with you to create brand standards, mood boards, and edit your website, social, and all internal and external marketing to match your companies vision.Influencer ManagementWe find influencers in your niche, negotiate the offer, and manage what/when/how they post and the links/codes to track. You receive an increase in targeted traffic, revenue, and professional lifestyle pictures.Social Media We learn your target market, competition, and product/service up down and backward. In doing so, we first create the strategy that makes you stand out on your social networks.

• Responsible for the execution of strategic social media and digital initiatives, including managing viral marketing campaigns, creating and supervising accounts, and integrating interactive media into the overall business strategy for Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, LinkedIn, and Instagram • Ensure collateral materials, promotions, point-of-purchase, and local store marketing tools follow current sales trends and goals, while keeping the brand/image aligned• Develop new business partners for sponsorships, exposure, and community involvement efforts and support cross-promotional opportunities with other companies• Manage organization and execution of promotions, marketing budget, and annual strategy for restaurants

As an Agent for Keller Williams, Ashley alleviates client’s fears, and counsels them through the home buying and selling process. For buyers she will be by their side at all times extensively discussing their dream home criteria, price points, and potential locations. For sellers she will utilize her extensive Marketing, Advertising, and Events background to strategically ensure homes are in the forefront of target potential buyers. Ashley's goal is to assist in kicking those stressors to the ground and allow buyers and sellers to get excited about their futures. She believes buying or selling a home is something to celebrate!

- Worked with juicing bar owner to create informative, fun, and easy to understand nutritional content for product labels, tagline, menu’s, ingredient descriptions, website, signage, blog posts, marketing materials, social media strategy, future postings, and photos for Twitter, Facebook, Pintrest and Instagram- Delivered all content on or before the due dates, proof-read, and ready to go live

At The Starr Conspiracy Ashley facilitated development of websites, online banner ads, product videos, direct mailers, emails blasts, whitepapers, print ads, social media campaigns, webinars, market research, and total rebrands. She saw an improvement could be made in the company and introduced standardized timeline procedure and template, to ensure punctual client deliverables. She also assisted in negotiating, planning, and implementing online media spend consisting of 10 media outlets.

Working with her families commercial real estate firm, Ashley supported business ventures by scouting locations, evaluating and identifying potential business opportunities, and aiding in negotiation preparation. She assisted in repairs and renovations of apartment complexes and prepared units for showings as well as participated in contract negotiations, executive conference calls, and group strategic planning sessions.

Ashley was responsible for hosting promotions at the W Hotel Scottsdale including fundraisers, concerts, pool parties, fashion shows, sporting events, theme nights, and holiday celebrations. She represented the Scottsdale 16 promotional modeling group on various trips to host parties in various clubs in Scottsdale, Las Vegas, and Atlantic City. She also participated in photo shoots for Scottsdale 16 and fashion shows for Beach Bunny Swimwear.

With 10 years of piano study under her belt, Ashley created a large private studio of students with skill levels ranging from beginners to high school students teaching classical repertoire of piano compositions. She established and maintained trusting relationships with 25-30 students and parents enhancing positive piano education and promoting an optimistic encouraging environment. She taught music theory, note reading, composer recognition, stage presence, and song retention.

Managing deadlines is a tricky game. Managing the various personalities of creatives and accounts is trickier. And trickiest of all is making sure every deliverable is accounted for, sent to clients on time, and of sound quality. Jennifer excelled at all three of those to the fullest extent. She is strong, determined, and diligent and accomplishes all duties with a huge smile across her face. I couldn't recommend her enough, she's a true asset to any company.
